title: How do I authenticate to an Azure API App from a separate Azure MVC App
body:
I am authenticating a user in an Azure App Service which is an MVC app. The authentication is with the older Azure ACS.

I also have a separate Azure App Service which is an API App (WebAPI).

I want to use whatever I can from the MVC app to send over to the API App to authenticate my user - how in the world do I do this? I will be sinding it via REST calls from Angular, though I am not sure that really matters.

Please let me know if you need more information.
